name: plover
description: 专注于模块化的NodeJs Web框架

scripts.test: mocha --require should --reporter spec --recursive --bail --check-leaks --timeout 5000 test/util/ test/components/ test/core/ test/index.js
scripts.cov: istanbul cover _mocha -- --require should --recursive --bail --check-leaks --timeout 5000 test/util/ test/components/ test/core/ test/index.js -R spec
scripts.travis: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- --require should --recursive --bail --check-leaks --timeout 5000 test/util/ test/components/ test/core/ test/index.js -R spec
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run travis

author: bencode@163.com
